QuestData.Title: A Not So Friendly Request
QuestData.Description: Scouts have reported a non-mantid presence near Kor'vess. Their intrusion and their theft of amber would normally be dealt with swiftly, but our forces are needed elsewhere.$b$bThis task seems suited to you, Wakener. You will convince them to leave this land, or you will destroy them in the name of the Klaxxi'va.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Sapmaster Vu at The Brewgarden in Dread Wastes.
QuestData.RewardText: So they want us to leave do they? What a selfish request! We're only taking amber from one tree.$b$bWell, I'm not going anywhere! I have brew to make.$b$bIf you help us maybe we can all come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I give them some brew, they stop trying to kill us.
